snippet.title: The Blue Flamingo Announcement trailer
snippet.description:
Get The Blue Flamingo here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/302010/The_Blue_Flamingo/

Shoot your way through intense levels with a swiftly increasing difficulty, in a game world completely built with handcrafted models. Invest your score in upgrades or save it to gain interest with the risk of losing it all. Use your greed wisely to beat your friends and climb up the score table in The Blue Flamingo.

The Blue Flamingo is a small indie game built completely with handmade models. The special effects are constructed from filmed firecrackers, and the music and sound affects are created with analog instruments and objects. 

Models created by: http://www.andershellstrom.com/
Read more about The Blue Flamingo and our other projects at: http://www.mightanddelight.com
